activities: With the individuals consent, CARCO conducts Pre and Post Employment Screening.  CARCO also conducts due diligence research activities with respect to mergers and acquisitions and other business related matters.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: CARCO agrees to cooperate with the panel of EU data protection authorities (EU DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC).
